mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectEvtApplcn Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ EVT_PARTCPTN_SN , EVT_NO , FREE_GIFT_TURN , APPLCN_MBR_SECT_CD , MBR_NO , APPLCN_DT , ORD_NO , ATEND_DAYCNT , STMP_COUNT , UTID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM EVT_APPLCN WHERE 1 = 1 AND EVT_PARTCPTN_SN = #{evtPartcptnSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteEvtApplcn Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM EVT_APPLCN WHERE 1 = 1 AND EVT_PARTCPTN_SN = #{evtPartcptnSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
